Product Loans

Whether you need a laptop for distance learning or want to upgrade to the latest smartphone, our cash-free Home Credit Loan makes it easy to buy what you need.

Pay in affordable monthly installments. Fast approval in just 1 minute.

Cash Loans

From life goals and investments to emergency expenses, we have you covered with Home Credit Cash Loan. Get approved in minutes, with no hidden charges.

Claim your cash through bank transfer or pick-up via our partner centers. Fast and secure!

Qwarta

Your Qwarta enables you to buy load or vouchers, pay bills, and shop on credit through the Home Credit App!

Enjoy Qwarta instant approval of up to 10,000 spending limit when you get a product loan.

Here’s What You Need

How to Qualify for a Loan

Ready to make that purchase? Here are some requirements before you apply for a loan:

Swipe to left

Filipino Citizen

Must be a Filipino citizen, age 18 - 68 years old

Primary ID

Must have one primary ID that contains your current address. List of Valid IDs

Source Of Income

Must have an income from reliable sources such as employment, business, pension, and remittances.

Customers with ongoing loans are qualified

Existing customers with ending loans can re-apply.

In The Service Of Every Filipino

Here for you,
From once to always

We want to help you overcome your financial worries. Over the years, we’ve innovated in the financial landscape by digitizing our products and services – so we’re right where you are, whether you’re in the store or in the comfort of your home.

9M Filipinos

We’ve empowered over 9 million Filipinos through our financial services and products

1.5B Transactions

Over P1.5 billion worth of daily transactions processed nationwide, making us a trusted and reliable financial partner.

9 Years

Operating and innovating for 9 years in the local fintech space, continuing to grow and serve you better.
